caption.p: Binding conformation and molecular interaction (compounds are represented as green sticks and key interacting residues are displayed in thin red wireframe representation) between MERS-CoV M pro and lead compounds and (A) Ergotamine (ZINC000052955754) (B) inhibitor GC813 (AW4). The hydrophobic interactions are indicated by red arcs with radiating spikes and green dashed lines correspond to hydrogen bonds.
